data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Valladolid.
In the minute 2, Throw-in for Valladolid at José Zorrilla.
Barcelona to take a throw-in in Valladolid territory.
Free kick for Valladolid in the half of Barcelona.
In the minute 3, Shon Weissman is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Valladolid's Ruben Alcaraz gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Mario Melero Lopez awards Barcelona a goal kick.
In the minute 5, Shon Weissman for Valladolid is back on the field again.
Ball safe as Valladolid is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Valladolid Valladolid drive forward through Oscar Plano. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 7, Barcelona's Lionel Messi breaks free at José Zorrilla. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Valladolid at José Zorrilla.
Free kick Barcelona.
In the minute 10, Ball goes out of play for a Barcelona goal kick.
Barcelona have been awarded a corner by Mario Melero Lopez.
Valladolid have a goal kick.
In the minute 15, Can Valladolid get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Barcelona's half?
Throw-in high up the field for Valladolid in Valladolid.
Barcelona awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 16, Mario Melero Lopez awards the away team a throw-in.
Mario Melero Lopez signals a free kick to Barcelona.
Ball goes out of play for a Valladolid goal kick.
In the minute 21, Barcelona's Lionel Messi gets in a shot on goal at José Zorrilla. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Barcelona.
Goal! Barcelona take a 0-1 lead through a well-placed header from Clement Lenglet.
In the minute 21, Great play from Lionel Messi to set up the goal.
Valladolid awarded a free kick in their own half.
Mario Melero Lopez signals a Valladolid throw-in in Barcelona's half.
In the minute 24, Throw-in for Barcelona in their own half.
Throw-in Barcelona.
Mario Melero Lopez awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 30, Valladolid are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Mario Melero Lopez signals a free kick to Barcelona in their own half.
Mario Melero Lopez awards Valladolid a goal kick.
In the minute 31, Barcelona pushes forward through Martin Braithwaite, whose finish on goal is saved.
Valladolid are whistled for offside.
Throw-in for Valladolid at José Zorrilla.
In the minute 33, In Valladolid a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Goal kick for Valladolid at José Zorrilla.
Free kick for Valladolid in their own half.
In the minute 35, Mario Melero Lopez signals a free kick to Barcelona.
Goal! Martin Braithwaite extends Barcelona's lead to 0-2.
Sergino Dest instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 37, Lionel Messi of Barcelona smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Throw-in for Valladolid in the half of Barcelona.
Valladolid awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 43, Mario Melero Lopez signals a free kick to Valladolid in their own half.
Barcelona's Lionel Messi is on target but unsuccessful.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Valladolid.
In the minute 45, The 1st half is prolonged by 1 minutes of added time.
The first-half has ended.
The second half has started at José Zorrilla.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 46, Toni Villa is replacing Marcos De Sousa for Valladolid at José Zorrilla.
Throw-in Valladolid.
In the minute 48, Corner awarded to Barcelona.
Valladolid have a goal kick.
In Valladolid Barcelona attack through Lionel Messi. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 49, Goal kick for Valladolid at José Zorrilla.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Valladolid push upfield but Mario Melero Lopez quickly pulls them for offside.
In the minute 51, Martin Braithwaite of Barcelona gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Valladolid.
Valladolid to take a throw-in in Barcelona territory.
In the minute 52, Mario Melero Lopez signals a free kick to Valladolid just outside Barcelona's area.
Pablo Hervias for Valladolid gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Mario Melero Lopez awards Barcelona a goal kick.
In the minute 55, Valladolid have been awarded a corner by Mario Melero Lopez.
Free kick for Barcelona in their own half.
Barcelona's Lionel Messi gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Valladolid defender.
In the minute 56, Barcelona have been awarded a corner by Mario Melero Lopez.
Valladolid's Ruben Alcaraz gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Barcelona have a goal kick.
In the minute 57, Kike Perez is replacing Oscar Plano for the home team.
Roque Mesa is on a sub for Michel Herrero for Valladolid.
Valladolid make their fourth substitution with Fabian Orellana replacing Jota.
In the minute 58, Throw-in for Valladolid in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Barcelona goal kick.
Lionel Messi of Barcelona smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 59, Corner awarded to Barcelona.
Barcelona are coming forward and Miralem Pjanic gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Valladolid at José Zorrilla.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Valladolid.
Barcelona have a goal kick.
In the minute 62, Jordi Alba (Barcelona) has received a yellow card from Mario Melero Lopez.
In the minute 63, Valladolid awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Valladolid.
In the minute 64, Ball goes out of play for a Barcelona goal kick.
Pablo Hervias is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Throw-in for Barcelona close to the penalty box.
Goal! Barcelona extend their lead to 0-3 through Lionel Messi.
In the minute 65, That's a fine assist from Pedri.
Pablo Hervias is back on his feet again.
Can Valladolid capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 68, Frenkie De Jong (Barcelona) gets a yellow card.
Valladolid's Roque Mesa misses with an attempt on goal.
Mario Melero Lopez awards Barcelona a goal kick.
In the minute 71, Barcelona have a dangerous throw-in.
The away team replace Ronald Araujo with Samuel Umtiti.
Ronald Koeman (Barcelona) is making a second substitution, with Sergio Busquets replacing Frenkie De Jong.
In the minute 71, The away team replace Jordi Alba with Junior Firpo.
Valladolid's Pablo Hervias is on target but unsuccessful.
Valladolid have been awarded a corner by Mario Melero Lopez.
In the minute 73, Barcelona pushes forward through Lionel Messi, whose finish on goal is saved.
Throw-in for Valladolid in the half of Barcelona.
Mario Melero Lopez signals a Barcelona throw-in in Valladolid's half.
In the minute 76, Free kick for Barcelona in their own half.
In Valladolid a free kick has been awarded the away team.
At José Zorrilla, Joaquin Fernandez has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 78, Play has been interrupted briefly in Valladolid to check on Sergio Busquets, who is grimacing with pain.
Can Valladolid get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Barcelona's half?
In the minute 79, Barcelona's Sergio Busquets looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Sergi Guardiola is on a sub for Javi Sanchez for Valladolid.
Ball safe as Valladolid is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Barcelona make their fourth substitution with Philippe Coutinho replacing Pedri.
In the minute 83, Sergi Guardiola for Valladolid gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Barcelona goal kick.
Valladolid awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 85, Mario Melero Lopez signals a free kick to Valladolid in their own half.
Mario Melero Lopez signals a free kick to Barcelona in their own half.
Mario Melero Lopez signals a Valladolid throw-in in Barcelona's half.
In the minute 87, Valladolid have been awarded a corner by Mario Melero Lopez.
Mario Melero Lopez signals a throw-in for Valladolid, close to Barcelona's area.
In Valladolid Valladolid attack through Roque Mesa. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 88, Goal kick for Barcelona at José Zorrilla.
Fabian Orellana for Valladolid drives towards goal at José Zorrilla. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Can Barcelona get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Valladolid's half?
Free kick for Barcelona in their own half.
Philippe Coutinho hits the post! Very nearly a goal there for Barcelona!
Mario Melero Lopez awards Valladolid a goal kick.
Barcelona are pushing forward but Martin Braithwaite's finish is wide of the goal.
Valladolid have a goal kick.
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Barcelona awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Barcelona.
Mario Melero Lopez awards the home team a throw-in.
The second-half is over. The match ends 0-3.
